directions: Mix pork, breadcrumbs, red pepper flakes, salt, egg, milk, parsley and onions together in bowl.  Shape into 8 to 12 patties.
Slowly brown in frying pan until juices run clear; drain well.  Heat sweet and sour sauce in frying pan.  Place cooked patties in pan and heat through.
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) jar sweet and sour sauce
title: Sweet and Sour Pork Patties
